name: Garbage Day (itch) (SpoonfullO'Tar)
description:
Garbage Day

Instructions - Arrow Keys to Move, Interact with People & Objects

A bitsy game detailing a garbage man's day amidst the toppling of a totalitarian government. It's quite short, and also my first time utilizing the bitsy engine. I hope you find/did find it to be an enjoyable story. Feel free to give feedback if you so desire.
